purpleculture_pinyin:
huái
Chinese scholar tree (Sophora japonica); Japanese pagoda tree
Китайское древо ученого (Sophora japonica); Японская пагода
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 鬼 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
槐树 [ huái shù ]: locust tree (Sophora japonica)
刺槐 [ cì huái ]: false acacia; Robinia pseudoacacia
洋槐 [ yáng huái ]: black locust tree (Robinia pseudoacacia)
指桑骂槐 [ zhǐ sāng mà huái ]: lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree; fig. to scold sb indirectly; to make oblique accusations (idiom)
国槐 [ guó huái ]: locust tree (Sophora japonica)

• ⿰ Left to right

    • 鬼 [ guǐ ] ghost; demon; sly, mischievous
heisig_chinese_memo: The scholar tree is the ghost's favorite tree because he thinks it will make him smarter.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The scholar tree is the ghost's favorite tree because he thinks it will make him smarter.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood " to " ghost " sound. " Pagoda tree" is the name of the tree, referring to the locust tree, which is a deciduous tree. "Said Wen": "Huai, wood. From wood, ghost sound." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Xuangong Two Years": "Touching the locust tree to die." means hitting the locust tree to die. Another example is "Zhuangzi. "Foreign Objects": "Yin and Yang go wrong, the heaven and the earth are big, so there is thunder and thunder, and there is fire in the water, but the big locust is burning."

Bronze inscriptions are used as place names, and Xuyang Ding: "Huaili, the content of a bucket and a rise."
humanum_short_description_en: From " wood ", " ghost " sound. " Pagoda tree" is the name of the tree, referring to the locust tree, which is a deciduous tree.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「鬼」聲。「槐」是樹名，指槐樹，屬落葉喬木。《說文》：「槐，木也。从木，鬼聲。」如《左傳．宣公二年》：「觸槐而死。」意謂撞槐樹而死。又如《莊子．外物》：「陰陽錯行，則天地大絯，於是乎有雷有霆，水中有火，乃焚大槐。」

　　金文用為地名，萯陽鼎：「槐里，容一斗一升。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「鬼」聲。「槐」是樹名，指槐樹，屬落葉喬木。

Chinese: The scholar tree is the ghost's favorite tree because he thinks it will make him smarter.
Meaning: scholar tree
Story: The scholar tree is the ghost's favorite tree because he thinks it will make him smarter.
Kind: both

從「 木 」，「 鬼 」聲。「 槐 」是樹名，指槐樹，屬落葉喬木。《說文》：「槐，木也。从木，鬼聲。」如《左傳．宣公二年》：「觸槐而死。」意謂撞槐樹而死。又如《莊子．外物》：「陰陽錯行，則天地大絯，於是乎有雷有霆，水中有火，乃焚大槐。」 金文用為地名，萯陽鼎：「槐里，容一斗一升。」
From " wood" to " ghost" sound. " Pagoda tree" is the name of the tree, referring to the locust tree, which is a deciduous tree. "Said Wen": "Huai, wood. From wood, ghost sound." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Xuangong Two Years": "Touching the locust tree to die." means hitting the locust tree to die. Another example is "Zhuangzi. "Foreign Objects": "Yin and Yang go wrong, the heaven and the earth are big, so there is thunder and thunder, and there is fire in the water, but the big locust is burning." Bronze inscriptions are used as place names, and Xuyang Ding: "Huaili, the content of a bucket and a rise."

槐字的基本解释

槐
huái
落叶乔木。木材可供建筑和制家具。花蕾可做黄色染料：槐火（用槐木取火）。槐序。槐楝（ａ．中国周代朝廷种三槐九棘，公卿大夫分坐其下，后因以“槐棘”指三公或三公之位；ｂ．指听讼的处所。均亦称“棘槐”）。槐鼎（喻三公）。
姓。

槐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
［《廣韻》户乖切，平皆，匣。］
［《廣韻》户恢切，平灰，匣。］
(1)槐树。落叶乔木，羽状复叶，小叶卵形至卵状披针形，夏开蝶形花，色黄白，结荚果，圆筒形。材质致密，可供建筑和制器用。花和果实可制黄色染料。花蕾种子和根上的皮可入中药。
(2)草名。即续断。多年生草本。种类颇多，根可入药。
(3)姓。唐有槐公俭。
[②]［huí］
［《廣韻》户恢切，平灰，匣。］
见“桃槐”。

槐字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槐； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页546第13
【唐韻】戸乖切【集韻】【韻會】乎乖切，?音懷。【說文】木也。【周禮·秋官】面三槐三公位焉。【註】槐之言懷也。懷來遠人於此，欲與之謀。【爾雅·釋木】櫰槐，大葉而黑，守宮槐葉晝聶宵炕。【藝文類聚】槐，季春五日而兔目，十日而鼠耳，更旬而始規，二旬而葉成。　又【春秋·說題辭】槐者，虛星之精。　又【周禮·夏官·司爟註】秋取槐檀之火。　又槐里，地名。【前漢·地理志】屬右扶風。　又水名。【山海經】敦與之山，槐水出焉。　又孟槐，獸名。【山海經】譙明之山有獸，狀如貆，赤毫，曰孟槐。　又姓。【統譜】望出廣漢。唐槐承榮、槐公儉。　又【集韻】【韻會】胡隈切【正韻】胡瑰切，?音回。【說文】守宮也。【春秋元命苞】樹槐，聽訟其下。【註】槐之言歸也，情見歸實也。　又【韻會】桃槐，西域國名。又琅槐，千乘郡縣名。

槐字的起名意思

：落叶乔木，即槐树，木材可供建筑和制家具，花蕾可做黄色染料。

Huai
Basic explanation of words
Huai
huái
Deciduous trees. Wood can be used for construction and furniture. Flower buds can be used as yellow dye: Sophora japonica (using Sophora japonica to make fire). Huai Xu. Sophora japonicus (a. The imperial court of the Zhou Dynasty in China planted three sophora japonicus and nine spines, and the public officials sat down separately. Later, the "sophora japonicus" referred to the position of the three males or three males; b. Refers to the place where the lawsuit was heard. ). Huaiding (Yu Sangong).
name.
Huai
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huái］
["Guangyun" households are obediently cut, flat, boxed. ]
["Guang Yun" Hu Hui cut, flat gray, box. ]
(1) Sophora japonica. Deciduous tree, pinnate compound leaves, leaflets ovate to ovate-lanceolate, summer butterfly-shaped flowers, yellow and white in color, pod-bearing, cylindrical. The material is dense and can be used for construction and equipment. Flowers and fruits can be made of yellow dye. The skin of flower bud seeds and roots can be used as traditional Chinese medicine.
(2) Cursive name. That is interrupted. Perennial herb. There are many types, and the roots can be used as medicine.
(3) Last name. Tang Youhuai is public and frugal.
[②]［huí］
["Guang Yun" Hu Hui cut, flat gray, box. ]
See "Peach Blossom".

Source glyph
Huai
Name meaning
: Deciduous trees, namely locust trees, wood can be used for construction and furniture, flower buds can be used as yellow dye.
会意字。从木,篆书形体像棵树,表示槐是一种树木;从鬼,迷信认为人死后变鬼,其形丑黑多变,借以表示槐有青黄
白黑数种,丑黑多变。本义是槐树。

Зная слово.
Из дерева печать печати похожа на дерево, что означает, что дерево саранчи является своего рода деревом; из призраков суеверие полагает, что люди превращаются в призраков после смерти, а его форма уродливая и черная, что означает, что существует несколько видов. дерева акации, некрасивого, черного и изменчивого.
Первоначальное значение - дерево акации.
В качестве строительных материалов можно использовать дерево саранчи, лиственное дерево, перистые сложные листья, светло-желтые цветы, стручки, дерево.
